ygData.subject: RE: Another suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: You are correct, the damage shields were far too powerful if put on a big SK (ogre/troll).  Your comments about Shadow Step are interesting. Lifetap/spike/draw
ygData.messageBody:
You are correct, the damage shields were far too powerful if put on a big SK
(ogre/troll). Your comments about Shadow Step are interesting.

Lifetap/spike/draw would be used near the end of a melee in a group -- you
could use it as a quick heal to minimize downtime.

And personally, it has always been my idea that an SK feeds off the life
force of the weak, so after a fight walking around and sucking the life out
of gnolls and orcs sounds very in character...

Brian
